title: What is the appeal of Garth Brooks? - Quora

response.answer_text: For many years, country artists were mostly known for great music but they lacked the exciting elements of arena shows. Garth was instrumental in bringing in the entertainment value and Rock N Roll gimmicks to performance, he was likely to swing in from a rope, for example. He took a lot of great elements of Rock N Roll and folded them into country music.
